verses.name: Matthew 16:12
verses.text: Then understood they how that he bade them not beware of the leaven of bread, but of the doctrine of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees.

verses.name: Matthew 16:13
verses.text: When Jesus came into the coasts of Cesarea Philippi, he asked his disciples, saying, Whom do men say that I the Son of man am?

verses.name: Matthew 16:14
verses.text: And they said, Some say that thou art John the Baptist: some, Elias; and others, Jeremias, or one of the prophets.

verses.name: Matthew 16:15
verses.text: He saith unto them, But whom say ye that I am?

verses.name: Matthew 16:16
verses.text: And Simon Peter answered and said, Thou art the Christ, the Son of the living God.
